analysisEngineMetaData.name: HistoryAnalysisEngineDescriptor
analysisEngineMetaData.description: The HistoryAnalysisEngineDescriptor describes an annotator that gives super high confidence to any entity that was found in our sample set originally. Ideally it would keep track of previous entities it has recognized. There is a theoretical flaw with this type of "analysis" because differing contexts can invalidate an identical string recognized before, but whatever. This is also not to mention that it's minimally useful.
